name: Connectictut
you_must: Connecticuters must register as a Democrat to vote for Bernie!

name: Oregon
you_must: Oregonians must register as a Democrat to vote for Bernie!

name: New Mexico
you_must: New Mexicans must register as a Democrat to vote for Bernie!

name: Washington D.C.
you_must: D.C. residents must register as a Democrat to vote for Bernie!

name: New Jersey
you_must: New Jerseyans must register as a Democrat to vote for Bernie! However, unaffiliated voters can declare their affiliation with the Democratic Party any time up to (and including) election day.

name: California
you_must: Californians must register as a Democrat or "no party preference" to vote for Bernie!

name: South Dakota
you_must: South Dakotans must be registered as a Democrat or independent to vote for Bernie Sanders!

name: Montana
you_must: Montanans can vote for Bernie Sanders regardless of their registered party. Montana has Same-Day Registration which allows you to register to vote at the primaries on Tue, June 7.

name: North Dakota
you_must: Any North Dakotan that intends to support the Democratic Party in the 2016 election can vote for Bernie Sanders, regardless of registration status.

name: Kentucky
you_must: Kentuckians must register as a Democrat to vote for Bernie!

name: Indiana
you_must: Hoosiers can vote for Bernie Sanders regardless of their registered party

name: Pennsylvania
you_must: Pennsylvanians must register as a Democrat to vote for Bernie!

name: West Virginia
you_must: West Virginians must register as a Democrat or undeclared to vote for Bernie!

name: Delaware
you_must: Delawareans must register as a Democrat to vote for Bernie!

name: Maryland
you_must: Marylanders must register as a Democrat to vote for Bernie!

name: Rhode Island
you_must: Rhode Islanders must register as a Democrat or undeclared to vote for Bernie
